This will create the base of the triangular prism. The dimensions of the base of the triangular prism are: * Length: 0.75 units * Width: 0.75 units * Height: 0.0207 units This concludes the instructions for Part 1 of the triangular prism assembly. Continue to Part 2 to construct the remaining sides of the prism.</description>
